thread.section_title: The Time New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location and Very Clean!
thread.title_full: Location and Very Clean! - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tahnee T
title: Location and Very Clean!
text: Location of this hotel is amazing, has many food options around and it about a 20 minute was to Grand Central station which was a plus for us. When we first checked in the staff member, which i think may have been the manager at the time, was extremely rude which put us off at the start however all other staff members were quite friendly. Elevator was annouying but we took the start which was not too bad. Rooms are really nice and modern - very clean. Overall i would stay here again.
